ui.main-menu.title: Font Settings
ui.main-menu.font-type-help.paragraph:
There're mainly three types of fonts in Stardew Valley:
- Small Font
- Medium Font
- Dialogue Font
Press the left or right arrow to switch.
You may only set one or two, or all of them, based on your liking.
ui.main-menu.font-type-help.latin-lang.p:
Latin Language:
You're under a latin language ({{locale}}).
To edit the dialogue font, go to configuration and check the "Enable custom dialogue font in latin languages" box.
